title: KHRYSOS
content:
KHRYSOS (Chrysos) was the personified spirit (daimon) of gold and riches.

Pindar, Fragment 222 (trans. Sandys) (Greek lyric C5th B.C.) :
        "Khrysos (Gold) is a child of Zeus; neither moth nor rust devoureth it; but the mind of man is devoured by
        this supreme possession."
